Reviews.Title: Security Day and Night
Reviews.Author: Michael Reeder "PhotoshopGuy"
Reviews.Content: I bought two VideoSecu IR801K Indoor/Outdoor Day/Night Vision Security Cameras. They both work great. I have mounted one outside so far. The daytime color view is real nice and the night vision is too. Good viewing range in the dark. The audio is clear no phantom sounds. One can see the IR lights in the dark if you look for them but not blatantly so. The cable is of good quality and the VHS adapters are solid. Good price for a solid product.

Reviews.Title: Great Value for Excellant Performance
Reviews.Author: John Hiemstra
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera at the same time I bought a higher priced unit from the same manufacturer.  I was surprised that this unit provides much better performance than the higher priced unit which appeared to have better features; a higher LED count and a higher TVL count!This is a mid-sized unit which provides excellant IR night vision out to about 50 feet.  The visual clarity is very good, both day and night.  The focus is automatic and appears to work well.I own three different IR cameras and this one is undoubtly the best of the three.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera for the Price!
Reviews.Author: R. Sterba
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these to connect to a new averdigi card I purchased for my computer.  To be honest, the motivation was that it had a Sony image sensor a good number of IR led's and one of the lowest prices I've seen.  So far this camera has been excellent.  It's not the sharpest resolution, and certainly doesn't compare to what you would get for a lot more money, but for a simple camera it's great.The picture quality both day and night is good, body and mount are solid.  You can see the IR LED's at night (faint red glow), but nothing obvious or distracting.  I wish the mount had a little more movement, but you can make it do what you want for the most part.The 3.6mm lens gives a nice wide view, even at close distances, excellent for an entry, which is what I'm using this one for.So far it's been a good camera that I would recommend, and will personally be buying at least a couple more of.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: JJ
Reviews.Content: Video quality is avg. IR is good for 20ft then quickly disapates.Placed order on 9-15 and finally received on 9-26.I should get a refund on shipping?Would recommend for non-critical areas that do not require highdefinition. Seems durable and is easily installed.

Reviews.Title: I rate this a BUY!
Reviews.Author: N EBANKS
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my DEFENDER security system. The original system was sold with only 4 cameras, by design. I purchased an additional three low profile under eve mount for the front of the house. You would not notice them in the daytime unless you are looking for them. At night, the infrared glows as a warning to anyone that needs to be warned. (My wife likes it that way). The final camera for the system is the VideoSecu above. This is a rather large outdoor camera (3X) as compared to the original Defender cameras. It appears sturdy and well made. The optics are as good as the original cameras with a wider field of view. The night performance is as good as most quality night (B&W;) cameras.The camera mount is very sturdy. The price with free shipping is very attractive. The VideoSecu cable is of better quality than most.  The only reason I did not give this five star is that focal is not adjustable. This however is nit picking, as this camera is not advertized as an adjustable focal length camera. VideoSecu will sell you one, if you need this feature.

Reviews.Title: Good Image- Well Built
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: Initially I purchased ne of these cameras to use to monitor my house entrance.  I was surprised by the wide field of view and image quality.  It is well built.  Only negative is the thickness of the wire and that it does not provide for tamper proof installation.  However it is a solid value.  Been running for 90 days under rain and sun without problems.  Very recommended for those looking for a good exterior security camera in a budget.

Reviews.Title: Beware: This is NOT for outdoor/waterproof use.
Reviews.Author: Habita Suites
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with this camera. Great image even in very low light conditions it worked great, until one day it rains, and the camera suddenly stop working. Four days passed and the camera was just dead..., so i decided to open it and find out what was happening and for my surprise i found water and rust everywhere inside the camera. They should change the information,(this was a good camera), but NOT outdoor/waterproof use. I'm pretty unhappy for what happened. I post some pictures of the rusted parts: [...]

Reviews.Title: Good Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: David W. Lewis
Reviews.Content: I purchased one of these cameras to replace a defective camera.  I needed two, but decided to order one to try it out.  I see someone reviewed this camera and gave it two stars complaining about resolution.  It's resolution is 420.  I was very pleased with the quality of the image.  I'm using my cameras on the exterior of my home.  The picture quality in daylight and nighttime is good.  I have several other 420 line cameras, and the image on this camera is the best of all of the ones I own.  Although I didn't need a mount, the mount which was included is a good quality mount.  I'll be ordering another one of these today to replace my other bad camera.I've purchased from Videosecu in the past, and even spoke with them on the phone a couple of years ago when they were doing business on Ebay, and they're customer service has always been excellent.

Reviews.Title: GREAT F.L.I.R. NIGHTVISION CAMERA!!
Reviews.Author: Bryan Kurt Weber
Reviews.Content: Baught this because someone stole My Car Stereo while I was watching a Movie in My Livingroom not 20ft from My Car on My {{{{1000watt Home Theater System}}}} ,  lolTHIS THING CAN SEE IN DEAD BLACK OF NIGHT FOR OVER 50ft VERY WELL!!!  and a ways Beyond with a little less distinction....Nice faint Red "Warning Glow" of the IR's when night falls,..Auto switches to B&W; in the Dark for better clarity,...and has a Decent overall Resolution for what I paid.  Though I would have liked a little more Res.,...I can't complain,..It's NightVision capabilities are Impressive!,...don't need to waste Electricity on My PortchLight anymore,...  lol  THE CAMERA SEE's ALL I NEED IT TO SEE!!,...combine it w/some Motion Detection Software,...and You're Set,...get the RIGHT Software,..and You can recieve Snapshots of what triggered Security Warnings sent to Your Smartphone while away!!! or even a "Loss of Signal" Warning,...in case Your Camera Singnals are CUT by Intruder,...You can see Snap's of moments that lead up to signal loss,...and if caused by a PERP.,..Just dial 911,..AND SEND THE CAVALRY IN to Check it out from wherever You are,....Great features to have w/ right Software! There are FREE Software apps. out there that give similar options.NICE CCTV Security CAMERA!  If I purchase another for another viewing angle,..I'll get the one with 540 lines of resolution,..rather then the 420 this one has,..but for the price,...You can't beat the Performance of this one!! I'll just use the lesser res. Camera for the Closer Views,..and the Higher Res. Camera,..for the "Big Picture",...further Distance View.VERY PLEASED!!! BUY IT!!  and on CANDID CAMERA,....CATCH THE PARASITES THAT ARE FEEDING ON YOUR HARD EARNED GAINS!!!P.S.  ALL THIEVES CAN ROTT IN H**L!!  Though I pray You find the right road to travel on!!  BUT IT WON'T BE MINE!!!  BECAUSE I NOW SEE THE LIGHT,...IN THE DARK!!!  lol  SMILE,...AND SAY  CHEESE!!!,...I'll get My Evidence,.. and YOU'LL Get a good MugShot!!!  lol

Reviews.Title: Great securty camera
Reviews.Author: Rex
Reviews.Content: This is the first camera that I purchased for my home security system and the only other camera I have gotten is a really cheap wireless one.  This camera blows the old camera away.  Something to note is that these cameras are not like camcorders or webcams so you can't expect HD quality or anything.  This camera has great color and easily lights up my front yard at night.  One of the things I like about this camera is that the infrared lights do not just come on full blast as its getting dark outside.  The darker it gets, the brighter the infrared lights become so that you get a nice progression on the video.  The camera over all feels very sturdy and well built.  I am considering buying another of these to add to my security system soon.Another thing to note about this camera is that the infrared LED's are the cheaper ones that put off a very very dim pink glow.  Some people like it because its a good warning to anyone who is sneaking around that they had better back off and that is probably better than having to deal with whatever they were planning on doing.  I hope to see more people include whether this glow is present or not in their reviews of other cameras.

Reviews.Title: Spice up the bedroom
Reviews.Author: bahhhoo "bahhhoo"
Reviews.Content: This is an update 3/1/12. Bought this camera less than a year ago. As of last week, it has stopped working. This camera never ran 24/7, but on special occasions, and indoors. I initially gave it a 5 star rating, but downgrading it to a one star for poor reliability.Ok, we did not buy this for security but for other reasons. We always wanted mirrors on the ceiling, but mirrors tend to be to difficult to install and remove when company comes over, thus decided on this camera. Easy to install, move around and remove. We connect it to our flat screen on the wall and have fun.The night time vision is cool too;)

Reviews.Title: Good daytime/not night
Reviews.Author: john
Reviews.Content: good camera for the money. Color is good better than the cheap cameras that came with my system. the night vision isnt the best same as the cheap cameras.

Reviews.Title: Just OK
Reviews.Author: Frog
Reviews.Content: This camera is worth the money.  The ir works fine. It is fine to observe movenment, what it lacks is clarity.  If this is your goal spend more money and get something with 650 tv lines or more.

Reviews.Title: Best value for budget cameras
Reviews.Author: Jon Wactor
Reviews.Content: I purchased the cheaper version of this camera first VideoSecu Outdoor Day Night Security Camera Infrared Weatherproof 1/3" CCD 420 TV Lines 28 IR LEDs 3.6mm Wide View Angle Lens CCTV Home Surveillance with Free Power Supply IRX5 to test out my system. With the cheaper camera I wasn't very happy with the sharpness of the image or the irregularities that occured when switching to night mode.This camera, on the other hand, is much better. The image is noticeably sharper (not crystal clear, but about as good as one can expect for the type of camera and price) and the transition to night mode is gradual and smooth. (The cheaper one would get confused and switch back and forth many times until the sky got completely dark). If you're putting together a budget camera system, I would recommend using this camera.

Reviews.Title: This camera is just as good as the camera's that cost a couple of hundred dollars.
Reviews.Author: Reginald Sutton
Reviews.Content: This camera is just as good as the camera's that cost a couple of hundred dollars. It also give the night viewing a little color, something that most security cameras even many at a higher price point don't do.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: works well nice wide angle ,good night vision black & white can't beat it at $55.00  ...better then $137.00 lorex that i tryed

Reviews.Title: wide angle and good night vision
Reviews.Author: Matthew Miller
Reviews.Content: i have 4 different cameras on my dvr system.I can't seem to quite find the right camera to get me the resolution I want.While this unit isnt any worse for resolution than the other 3 that we have in the same $35-60 price range, this one does have better night vision capability.  I would say that you have pretty solid night vision within 40-50 feet.This unit has what i would call Wide angle viewing, however it is not as wide as one of my other units(VideoSecu CCTV Home Video Outdoor CCD Bullet Security Camera Day Night 24 IR Infrared LEDs with Free Power Supply 1CJ)Also, keep in mind that wider angle = lower resolution...  sort of.  the wider angle, the more info is shoved onto your screen, and therfore the smaller it appears.  This unit seems to be a good comprimise for having wide angle, but there is no hope of reading a license plate with it.it is also about 50% larger and heavier than the regular units it compares to..  just something to know.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: nukegm
Reviews.Content: this is a good camera for the priceworks perfectly for 2 months, with one exception...the infared does not work at temperatures under 15 degreesat zero degrees, with the porch lights on, all is goodbut for some reason, no i.r. at very cold tempsfor the price, i am mostly pleased.update3 out of 4 cameras at zero degrees go black/dark - no input.its december 4 2013otherwise, the cameras are good. and still pleased.anyone who wants to rob me in zero degree temps - good luck to them....

Reviews.Title: very poor night vision
Reviews.Author: Thomas Giambra
Reviews.Content: Day vision is good and the wide angle is good BUT the night vision is NOT as expected. Very Poor

Reviews.Title: It is a color ir camera, not for a serious user.
Reviews.Author: Certified Spring Brk "BazaroWorld"
Reviews.Content: My biggest gripe is there is not enough technical info on the camera on this site to make a good buying decision. And not enough manufacturer data to google it for more info.  Therefore, I relied on the prior reviews and bought 2 of these cameras. I wish I had spent my money on better cameras.They do look good and the mounting is actually better than most, bla, bla, bla.The cameras arrived quickly.Night and day, they give pictures.However, the cameras are only good enough to distinguish someone, for police, for only about 15 or 20 feet max, day or night. The pictures are grainy and would not be of any value in a retail area to distinguish items on a shelf, especially if something ends up missing.I am assuming they are only about 420 lines of resolution, or less, but like I said, I still can not find enough info on them to know for sure. Now I know never to buy a camera with less than 480 lines of resolution.I much prefer to purchase from Amazon than EBay, BUT, with enough searching one can usually find better technical info on EBay.

Reviews.Title: So good night time vision
Reviews.Author: EFTHYMIOS PAPADOPOULOS
Reviews.Content: We order more than one and they are perfect night vision and very clear picture, 6 months of permanent use outdoors in an area close to the beach and no rust, only I suggest to install anti-rust screws for the bracket. Buy this product, you wont regret it

Reviews.Title: Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Breier
Reviews.Content: Looks real and that's what I was looking fo to help keep the bad guys away. Very easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Great camera with excellent customer support.
Reviews.Author: Frank Rice "Unclebens"
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great, even at night, with or without light it has a great picture. I would recomend this camera to anyone wanting a crisp clear picture. It gets two thumbs up from me.

Reviews.Title: Great video camera
Reviews.Author: custombill
Reviews.Content: I've been so far very happy with this camera. The mount was easy to adjust and the camera has a large field of view with great night vision range. It seems to be much better at motion detection than some other cameras I've used. It definitely is a big step above the 1/4" CCD cameras. The only issue I've had, and I think this applies to all cameras of this type, as other brands of cameras I've used have had the same issue, is it doesn't react so well to bright lights, like motion detection security lighting directly visible in the field of view. I think it's much better if your security lighting acts as back lighting to the camera. I will probably be buying another one of these in the near future.

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Kristen M. Norton
Reviews.Content: This is my second camera like this.  especially love how you can see clearly in the dark, with the night vision.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu CCTV Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Noah3113
Reviews.Content: Great product....excellent night vision!!  And who can compare with SONY products.  The camera is easy to install and comes with all the necessary attachments to hook up to your DVR. The only thing you will need is an extension cord in case you want to mount the camera at least 50 feet away from the DVR.

Reviews.Title: Nice upgrade
Reviews.Author: L. DeBarge
Reviews.Content: I ordered this as an upgrade to the cheapos that came with my zmodo system. The cameras on the most all of the low cost systems are good for a very narrow view and the night vision is not too great. This Camera offers a much wider view and night vision is much better (clear for 20 ft). Day time color VERY nice. This is not production quality, but for HOME security hard to go wrong with this camera. i feel it produces about the best you can hope for at 420 lines.If You are looking for license plate quality pics, this is not it you would need higher resolution. I am pretty happy with the performance for price and will definitely order more if I decide to upgrade other areas.

Reviews.Title: Cam1
Reviews.Author: Pup
Reviews.Content: This is a good not a great camera if you do not expect a clear picture beyond 10-12 ft, the night vision function is not that good. Picture wash-out."Well built housing"

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera for Home Security
Reviews.Author: DakotaSurfer "DS"
Reviews.Content: I've tried a couple different inexpensive security cameras and this one has been the best yet.  I needed clear day and night images and this camera does both.  The IR in this camera makes the night vision almost look like daylight images.  The next time we have vandals they'll be easy to identify.  No more fuzzy or grainy images at night.  Just what the local police suggested for night-time clarity.  Make a simple 1" hole in the wall and the wires will slide right through.  I may even add another one next spring.

Reviews.Title: Security camera
Reviews.Author: Raypa
Reviews.Content: Very good camera. I purhcased it to add to a Q-See 16 channels on which I already had 12 camera. Sharp image and works very well.

Reviews.Title: NOT WATERPROOF
Reviews.Author: a "a"
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera up for a couple of years now and it failed about 4 months ago. The case was flooded with water and shorted out the system.Not very stoked.

Reviews.Title: wow, easy set up and it works
Reviews.Author: muttmaster
Reviews.Content: can't believe the quality of the pic, not sure if it is because of my new Flat screen TV, but I am very happy with the view, can't wait until night fall and see if works as well. Not much instructions came with the unit, but I guess I didn't need any and there isn't much to adjust. However, it would be nice if it came with instructions on how to integrate a recording system and with another unit, etc. I am planning on buying another one to watch over my back gates.

Reviews.Title: Night vision is horrible
Reviews.Author: F. Ayd
Reviews.Content: The night vision is really bad on these.That's all I wanted it for, therefore this was a really bad purchase.Plus it was missing the screw to attach it to the mount.

Reviews.Title: worked for a week
Reviews.Author: Randy
Reviews.Content: Installation was quick and easy. Picture quality was OK for the first week, but the camera has  quite working. Can't find any information on the warranty.

Reviews.Title: Muy buena camara
Reviews.Author: ralvasal
Reviews.Content: Camara con buen enfoque, buena visualizacion en la noche, tamaño aceptable.Ya llevo varios meses utilizandola para la seguridad de mi casa y funciona excelente.

ProductInfo.Features:
Image sensor: Built-in 1/3" SONY CCD imager, color DSP. Signal system: NTSC
Lens: 3.6mm wide angle. 420 horizontal lines
Built in light sensor, 28 Infrared illuminators for night vision
Weatherproof housing. Auto iris AES
Package including: 1 camera, 1 bracket, 1 power supply, 1 warning sticker included
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu CCTV Security Camera Built-in 1/3" SONY CCD Outdoor Indoor Weatherproof Night Vision IR Infrared Free Power Supply C67
